DOC.brief_summary: The outcomes of ADL training in stroke patients depend on multifactors and essential practical point is cooperation plus effective communication between occupational therapist and nurse.
DOC.brief_title: The Outcomes of Seamless ADL Training Between Occupational Therapist and Nurse in Stroke Patients
DOC.criteria: First attack of stroke Good sitting balance TMSE 24 or more Need help in dresssing and bathing Bilateral hemiparesis Dependent ADL before stroke attack Dementia Depression
